sn14.36:4.2: “Mendicants, the arising, continuation, and rebirth and manifestation of the earth element is the arising of suffering, the continuation of diseases, and the manifestation of old age and death.
sn14.36:4.3: The arising of the water element …
sn14.36:4.4: The arising of the fire element …
sn14.36:4.5: The arising, continuation, and rebirth and manifestation of the air element is the arising of suffering, the continuation of diseases, and the manifestation of old age and death.
sn14.36:5.1: The cessation, settling, and ending of the air element is the cessation of suffering, the settling of diseases, and the ending of old age and death.
sn14.36:5.2: The cessation of the water element …
sn14.36:5.3: The cessation of the fire element …
sn14.36:5.4: The cessation, settling, and ending of the air element is the cessation of suffering, the settling of diseases, and the ending of old age and death.”
